**Jade Purity Supreme Palace Regulations of the Grand Perfection Text**

*Scripture Title:* *Jade Purity Supreme Palace Regulations of the Grand Perfection Text*. Author unknown, approximately composed during the Northern and Southern Dynasties. Contains the regulations and precepts of the Grand Perfection, along with the names, taboos, and images of the various Heavenly Lords. One scroll.

*Source:* *Zhengtong Daoist Canon*, Orthodox Section, Part One.

---

**Jade Purity Supreme Palace Regulations of the Grand Perfection Text**

To betray the master and neglect the Dao,
To assail the master and attack the Dao,
To envy the master and obstruct the Dao,
To deceive the master and mislead the Dao—

One ought to cherish the master and honor the Dao,
Ought to revere the master and esteem the Dao,
Ought to uphold the master and trust the Dao,
Ought to delight in the master and return to the Dao,
Ought to serve the master and inquire of the Dao,
Ought to exalt the master and treasure the Dao,
Ought to remember the master and preserve the Dao,
Ought to follow the master and turn toward the Dao.

**First Article, First Chapter**, under the jurisdiction of the Upper Prime Luminous Brahma, Supreme Luminous Ministry, governed by the True Inspector of Immortals, with twenty-four myriad officials presiding.

To disdain the scriptures and despise the Dao,
To defame the scriptures and disregard the Dao,
To doubt the scriptures and slander the Dao,
To damage the scriptures and ruin the Dao—

Revealing scriptures and exposing the Dao,
Transmitting scriptures and demeaning the Dao,
Stealing scriptures and thieving the Dao,
Defying scriptures and betraying the Dao.
One ought to exalt the scriptures and honor the Dharma,
Ought to revere the scriptures and esteem the Dharma,
Ought to trust the scriptures and turn toward the Dharma,
Ought to cherish the scriptures and treasure the Dharma,
Ought to conceal the scriptures and safeguard the Dharma,
Ought to transmit the scriptures and heed the Dharma,
Ought to pledge to the scriptures and follow the master’s Dharma,
Ought to follow the scriptures and seek the Dharma.

**Second Article, Second Chapter**, under the jurisdiction of the Middle Prime Solar Ministry, governed by the Inspector of Immortals, with twenty-four myriad officials presiding.

Drinking wine and scattering the spirit,
Indulging in wine and losing one’s way,
Raging with wine and losing one’s nature,
Provoked by wine to reckless anger,
Lusting after wine and harming one’s qi,
Disordering with wine and drifting astray,
Creating wine and wailing in sorrow,
Bewildered by wine and lost in confusion.
One ought to moderate wine to nurture one’s nature,
Ought to abandon wine and swallow one’s saliva,
Ought to cut off wine and settle the spirit,
Ought to restrain wine to maintain constancy,
Ought to be cautious with wine to discipline the self,
Ought to distance oneself from wine and contemplate the True,
Ought to extinguish wine to uphold reverence,
Ought to renounce wine to pacify the heart.

**Third Article, Third Chapter**, under the jurisdiction of the Lower Prime Dharma Decree Orthodox Immortal Ministry, governed by the Inspector of Immortals, with twenty-four myriad officials presiding.

Lustful desires defile and pollute,
Consorting with kin in fleshly union,
Coveting other men’s wives,
Lustful desires exceeding all bounds,

Wasting essence and losing qi,
Greedy and filthy, arrogant and haughty,
Indulging in rich flavors and glory,
Violating Heaven’s prohibitions and taboos.
One ought to diligently purify the heart and cleanse the self,
Ought to harmonize the six relations,
Ought to guard the True and discipline conduct,
Ought to keep the eyes free from perversion,
Ought to cherish essence and nurture the spirit,
Ought to cultivate reverence and restrain the self,
Ought to calm the heart and follow nature,
Ought to maintain purity and act with awe and caution.

**Fourth Article, Fourth Chapter**, under the jurisdiction of the Left Office Yang Brightness Orthodox Qi Ministry, governed by the Inspector of Immortals, with twenty-four myriad officials presiding.

Vicious speech and cruel tongues,
Slandering the Dao and its teachers in litigation,
Malicious attacks without cause,
Gossiping of others’ gains and losses,
Envying others while praising oneself,
Inciting strife among heaven and humanity,
Stirring up right and wrong,
Damaging and depleting spirit and qi.
One ought to speak with kindness toward all beings,
Ought to cherish words and惜 speech,
Ought to discipline the mouth and guard against faults,
Ought to utter words that invoke goodness,
Ought to seal the mouth in yielding to righteousness,
Ought to speak with harmony and goodwill,
Ought to let the mouth always speak goodness,
Ought to treasure the mouth and nurture the spirit.

**Fifth Article, Fifth Chapter**, under the jurisdiction of the Right Office Yin Origin Inspector of Immortals Ministry, with twenty-four myriad officials presiding.

Taking lives and harming beings,
Mutilating fetuses and harming the pregnant,
Shooting flying birds,
Slaughtering and harming the six livestock,

Hunting with hawks and coursing with hounds,
Wishing others’ ruin and downfall,
Maiming and harming creatures that stir and move,
Cutting short the blossoms and fruits of life.
One ought to ponder human life,
Ought to ponder growth and flourishing,
Ought to ponder flight and soaring,
Ought to ponder the brevity of their lives,
Ought to ponder their lack of understanding,
Ought to wish others’ success and fulfillment,
Ought to ponder great compassion,
Ought to ponder lush abundance.

**Fifth Article, Sixth Chapter**, under the jurisdiction of the Central Office Grand Rectifier of the Immortals Ministry, with twenty-four myriad officials presiding.

Seizing what others cherish,
Concealing and severing treasures,
Stealing the myriad things,
Damaging and taking by force,
Plotting treason and defying the Dao,
Scheming against ruler and father,
Gathering wicked factions,
Plundering without restraint.
One ought to distance oneself from toil and abandon desire,
Ought to purify the heart and keep it unsullied,
Ought to uphold integrity and act with caution,
Ought to avoid suspicion and shun doubt,
Ought to ponder loyalty and diligence,
Ought to fulfill one’s duty to the utmost,
Ought to embrace emptiness and tranquility,
Ought to refrain from harming the myriad beings.

**Fifth Article, Seventh Chapter**, under the jurisdiction of the Primordial Qi First Illumination Office Rectifier of the Immortals Ministry, with twenty-four myriad officials presiding.

Concealing harm against the loyal and good,
Wishing others injury and ruin,
Exposing others’ hidden faults,
Holding others’ strengths and weaknesses.

Deceiving with outward compliance while harboring inner deceit,
Speaking fair words while concealing wickedness,
Employing cunning and deceit,
Uttering flowery speech devoid of substance.
One ought to refrain from harming the myriad beings,
Ought to contemplate peace throughout the world,
Ought not to expose others’ hidden affairs,
Ought not to exploit others’ weaknesses,
Ought to align heart with countenance,
Ought to harmonize inner and outer,
Ought to ponder loyalty and uprightness,
Ought to be steadfast without while sincere within.

**Fifth Article, Eighth Chapter**, under the jurisdiction of the Primordial Qi Yellow Numinosity Office Rectifier of the Immortals Ministry, with twenty-four myriad officials presiding.

Defiling and disdaining the Three Luminaries,
Showing disrespect to gods and spirits,
Baring oneself before the Five Peaks,
Relieving oneself in rivers and seas,
Destroying and abandoning serene shrines,
Burning and ruining sacred texts,
Slaying and assaulting divine spirits,
Mocking and ridiculing perfected immortals.
One ought to wear proper attire when going out and coming in,
Ought to revere and honor the Void and Nonexistent,
Ought to respect and serve the famous mountains,
Ought to maintain purity in clear streams,
Ought to wish for the Dao’s eternal presence,
Ought to esteem the celestial sages’ teachings,
Ought to ensure ghosts and spirits bear no grievance,
Ought to rejoice in and aspire to the immortal Dao.

The Ninth Section of the First Scroll, presided over by the Twenty-Four Myriad Officials of the Primordial Qi Cavern-Luminous Ministry of Grand Immortals.

The Nine Articles of the Grand Perfected Writ serve to examine the conduct of superior perfected ones in their immortal practice. Minor trials span three years, confronting myriad hardships; intermediate trials entail the loss of bodily form and immortal rank; major trials extend nine years, where after the wind-blade tribulation, one forfeits the human Dao.

Minor merit manifests as radiant light in the world, with the Three Realms offering protection, averting untimely and unjust calamities. Intermediate merit commands the service of ten thousand spirits, naturally summoning the Five Emperors, and befriending perfected immortals. Great merit culminates in Dao attainment, ascending to heaven in broad daylight, ascending to the celestial palaces, and roaming freely in the Upper Clarity. The merits and transgressions are categorized according to the Grand Perfected Writ. All talismans within the scroll are inscribed in vermilion.

The Celestial Sovereign of the Supreme August Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Supreme Jade Perfection Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Clear Brightness and Harmonious Youth Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Mysterious Womb Nurturing Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Primordial Brightness and Literary Elevation Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Supreme Brightness and Seven Luminaries Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.

The Celestial Sovereign of the Supreme Ultimate Veiled Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Vermilion Brightness and Harmonious Yang Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Mysterious Brightness and Reverent Splendor Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.

The Celestial Sovereign of the Bamboo Grove August Gourd Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Void Brightness and Hall Luminance Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Observant Brightness and Upright Serenity Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Mysterious Brightness and Reverent Celebration Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Supreme Resplendence and Jade Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Primordial Capacity and Aperture Ascent Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.

The Celestial Sovereign of the Primordial Yellow and Filial Awn Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Supreme Yellow and Venerable Weight Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Thoughtless River and Origin Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Supreme Divination and Joyous Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Limitless Vow Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Luminous Court and Cloudy Ascent Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.

The Celestial Sovereign of the Supreme Simplicity and Forbidden Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Supreme Void and Constant Fusion Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Supreme Release and Ascendant Victory Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Dragon Transformation and Brahman Ascent Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.
The Celestial Sovereign of the Supreme Ultimate and Flourishing Heaven of the Primordial Cavern-Void, Natural Highest King Qi, Golden Palace, Most Sagely Great Emperor.

The Primordial Origin arose before the formless heavens, within the mysterious qi, chaotic and without shape, transforming nine times in a single day. Upon reaching the Upper Mystery, the Azure Qi gave birth to the Sovereign, styled the "Eternally Abiding Without Form." Born within the Azure Qi, he was named the "Eternally Abiding Without Form," with the cognomen Wheel Heaven Lad, who, after one kalpa within the qi, gave birth to the Mysterious Qi of the Mysterious.

After the Mysterious Qi was established, by the Middle Origin, the Yellow Qi first divided. The Wheel Heaven Lad uttered this writ upon the Azure Yang, named the "Writ of the Opening Venerable Master," with thirty-six direct talisman officials. By the time the Three Origins were established, this writ became luminous in the Lunar Palace. The Wheel Heaven Lad transformed and was born within the Middle Origin Yellow Qi, styled the "Nameless Sovereign," with the cognomen Avalokiteśvara, who, after two kalpas within the Yellow Qi, gave birth to the Lower Origin White Qi.

After the Middle Origin Prosperity was established, by the Middle Origin Qi, Avalokiteśvara uttered this writ upon the Yellow Essence, named the "Writ of Pervasive Scenery and Salvific Measure," with thirty-six direct talisman officials. By the time the Celestial Origin clouds divided and judged, it was to examine the Most High Venerable. Avalokiteśvara transformed and was born within the Lower Origin White Qi, styled the "Primordial Venerable," with the cognomen Opening Supreme Clarity. Within the White Qi, this one spirit transformed into three appellations, abiding within the three qi of the chaotic kalpas for three kalpas, giving birth to the Clear and Subtle Heaven.

After Avalokiteśvara, by the Clear and Subtle Heaven, Opening Supreme Clarity uttered this writ within the White Qi, named the "Writ of Numinous Flight and Transcending Tribulation," with thirty-six direct talisman officials. Upon the Clear and Subtle Heaven, it was to examine the Most High Great Dao Sovereign. The Celestial Emperor of the Clear and Subtle Heaven established the Clear and Subtle Heaven, styled the "Primordial Celestial King," with the cognomen Chaotic Spirit Supreme Essence, which was the cognomen of the Primordial Venerable. Within the Clear and Subtle Heaven, he governed the Upper Palace of Jade Clarity for one kalpa, giving birth to the Yu-Yu Heaven.

The Yu-Yu Heaven gave birth to the Huang-Zeng Heaven, also named the Mi-Fan-Luo-Tai-Xiao-Jue-Fei Heaven, the cloud-root capital of the Jade Clarity’s Upper Writ, where the essence opened the True Cavern’s Luminous Jade Treasure, with thirty-six direct talisman officials. The Celestial Emperor of the Yu-Yu Heaven established the Yu-Yu Heaven, styled the "High Sage Jade Dawn Supreme Great Dao," with the cognomen Yan-Chun. Within the Yu-Yu Heaven, at the Great Mystery Capital, he governed for two kalpas, giving birth to the Great Red Heaven.

The Yu-Yu Heaven gave birth to the Tai-Ming-Yu-Wan Heaven, also named the Yu-Yue-Na-Lin-Chang-Yu-Tai Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Nine Radiance Great Dawn Cavern-True Entering-Nothing Flying Scenery Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial Emperor of the Great Red Heaven first established it, styled the "Three Heavens Jade Youth," with the cognomen Yuan-Zheng-Xian. Within the Great Red Heaven, he governed for three kalpas, giving birth to the Yu-Shan-Immeasurable Heaven.

The Great Red Heaven gave birth to the Qing-Ming-He-Tong Heaven, also named the Gao-Tao-Chong-Long-Luo Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Observing Numinous Primordial Spirit Flying Heaven Birth-Immortal Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial Emperor of the Yu-Shan-Immeasurable Heaven first established it, styled the "Nine Heavens Venerable," with the cognomen Kai-Yuan. Within the Immeasurable Heaven, by one qi, he ascended to abdicate to the Uppermost Good Immeasurable Longevity Heaven.

The Yu-Shan-Immeasurable Heaven first established, gave birth to the Xuan-Tai-Ping-Yu Heaven, also named the Bi-Luo-Kong-Ge-Yu-Li Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the General Dawn Non-Ultimate Flying Immortal Salvation-World Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial King of the Uppermost Good Immeasurable Longevity Heaven first established it, styled the "Nine Heavens True King," with the cognomen Shang-Ming. Within the Immeasurable Longevity Heaven, by two qi, he gave birth to the Upper Supervisory Heaven.

The Uppermost Good Immeasurable Heaven gave birth to the Yuan-Ming-Wen-Ju Heaven, also named the Jia-Mo-Tan-Lou-Yu-Yi Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Convergent Radiance Resisting-Root Flying Birth Salvation-World Divine Immortal Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial King of the Upper Supervisory Heaven first established it, styled the "Nine Empyrean Supreme True Venerable," with the cognomen Ning. Within the Upper Supervisory Heaven, by three qi, he gave birth to the Dou-Shu Heaven.

The Upper Supervisory Heaven gave birth to the Shang-Ming-Qi-Yao Heaven, also named the Fu-Dao-Gai-Hua-Fu-Luo Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Flying Primordial Mysterious Scenery Dawn Level Salvation-World Divine Immortal Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial King of the Dou-Shu Heaven first established it, styled the "Nine Empyrean Great True King," with the cognomen Ming-Chuan. Within the Dou-Shu Heaven, by four qi, he gave birth to the No-Pride Joy Heaven.

The Dou-Shu Heaven gave birth to the Xu-Wu-Yue-Heng Heaven, also named the Wei-Ye-Qu-Chu-Mo Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Conjoined Radiance Dawn Life Responding Numinous Immortal Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial King of the No-Pride Joy Heaven established it, styled the "Myriad Beginnings Master Cavern-Rippling Waves," governing within the No-Pride Joy Heaven by five qi, giving birth to the Responsive Sound Heaven.

The No-Pride Joy Heaven gave birth to the Tai-Ji-Meng-Yi Heaven, also named the Chong-Rong-Yu-Yu-Gu-Sha Heaven. Upon its establishment, the Upper Clarity gave birth to the Cavern-Subtle Equal-True Radiance Dawn Mysterious Scenery Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial King of the Responsive Sound Heaven, styled the "Scenery Dao August Uppermost Master," with the cognomen Yue, governed within the Responsive Sound Heaven by six qi, giving birth to the Brahma Treasure Heaven.

The Responsive Sound Heaven gave birth to the Chi-Ming-He-Yang Heaven, also named the Shan-Yuan-Cha-Bao-Lun-Fa Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Jade Canopy Salvation-Immortal Seven Dragons Marriage-Concealment Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial Emperor of the Brahma Treasure Heaven, styled the "Eight Observations High Primordial Purple Scenery Lord," with the cognomen Dao-Jing, governed within the Brahma Treasure Heaven by seven qi, giving birth to the Brahma-Makaya Heaven.

The Brahma Treasure Heaven gave birth to the Xuan-Ming-Gong-Hua Heaven, also named the Fan-Yuan-Water-Path Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Great Salvation-World Flying Immortal Entering-Primordial Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial Emperor of the Brahma-Makaya Heaven, styled the "Nine Augusts Purple Heaven Elder," with the cognomen Zhi-Shu, governed within the Brahma-Makaya Heaven by eight qi, giving birth to the Pari-Da-He Heaven.

The Brahma-Makaya Heaven gave birth to the Yao-Ming-Zong-Piao Heaven, also named the Fan-Qi-Small-Micro Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Divine Immortal Nine Preservations Primordial Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial Emperor of the Pari-Da-He Heaven first gave birth to the Red Essence Supreme True Chaotic Primordial. Within the Pari-Da-He Heaven, by one kalpa, he gave birth to the Mo-Ke-Ru-Ming Heaven.

The Pari-Da-He Heaven gave birth to the Zhu-Luo-Huang-Jia Heaven, also named the Brahma-Conduct Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Divine Immortal Flying Conduct Cavern-Primordial Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial Lord and King of the Mo-Ke-Ru-Ming Heaven, styled the "Jade Clarity High Supreme Primordial Sovereign," with the cognomen Kai-Zao, governed within the Mo-Ke-Ru-Ming Heaven by one kalpa, giving birth to the A-Po-Luo-Mo-Ru-He Heaven.

The Mo-Ke-Ru-Ming Heaven gave birth to the Xu-Ming-Tang-Yao Heaven, also named the Brahma Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Divine Immortal Salvation-World Life-Connecting Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial King of the A-Po-Luo-Mo-Ru-He Heaven, styled the "Jade Clarity Purple Void High Supreme Primordial August," with the cognomen Ji, governed within the A-Po-Luo-Mo-Ru-He Heaven by one kalpa, giving birth to the A-Wei-Yi-Luo Heaven.

The A-Po-Luo-Mo-Ru-Qi Heaven gave birth to the Guan-Ming-Duan-Jing Heaven, also named the Great Radiance Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Divine Immortal Salvation-World Flying Spirit Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial King of the A-Wei-Yi-Luo Heaven, styled the "Jade Clarity Upper August Jade Void Lord," with the cognomen Ming-Lan, governed within the A-Wei-Yi-Luo Heaven by one kalpa, giving birth to the Tai-Xuan-Na-Shou Heaven.

The A-Wei-Yi-Luo Heaven gave birth to the Xuan-Ming-Gong-Qing Heaven, also named the Water-Sound Mysterious Sand Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Divine Immortal Salvation-World Flying Birth Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Concluding Section of the Jade Clarity Upper Palace Regulations on the Great Perfection Scriptures

[Note 1: The character "又" is suspected to be a miswriting of "分".]
[Note 2: The phrase "天天" is suspected to be a miswriting of "天立".]
[Note 3: The character "元" is suspected to be a miswriting of "字".]
[Note 4: The two characters "直符" were originally missing and have been supplemented based on the context.]
[Note 5: The two characters "玉符" were originally missing and have been supplemented based on the context.]

The Nine Articles of the Grand Perfected Writ serve to examine the conduct of superior perfected ones in their immortal practice. Minor trials span three years, confronting myriad hardships; intermediate trials entail the loss of bodily form and immortal rank; major trials extend nine years, where after the wind-blade tribulation, one forfeits the human Dao.

Minor merit manifests as radiant light in the world, with the Three Realms offering protection, averting untimely and unjust calamities. The Primordial Origin arose before the formless heavens, within the mysterious qi, chaotic and without shape, transforming nine times in a single day. Upon reaching the Upper Mystery, the Azure Qi gave birth to the Sovereign, styled the "Eternally Abiding Without Form." Born within the Azure Qi, he was named the "Eternally Abiding Without Form," with the cognomen Wheel Heaven Lad, who, after one kalpa within the qi, gave birth to the Mysterious Qi of the Mysterious.

After the Mysterious Qi was established, by the Middle Origin, the Yellow Qi first divided. The Wheel Heaven Lad uttered this writ upon the Azure Yang, named the "Writ of the Opening Venerable Master," with thirty-six direct talisman officials. By the time the Three Origins were established, this writ became luminous in the Lunar Palace. The Wheel Heaven Lad transformed and was born within the Middle Origin Yellow Qi, styled the "Nameless Sovereign," with the cognomen Avalokiteśvara, who, after two kalpas within the Yellow Qi, gave birth to the Lower Origin White Qi.

After the Middle Origin Prosperity was established, by the Middle Origin Qi, Avalokiteśvara uttered this writ upon the Yellow Essence, named the "Writ of Pervasive Scenery and Salvific Measure," with thirty-six direct talisman officials. By the time the Celestial Origin clouds divided and judged, it was to examine the Most High Venerable. Avalokiteśvara transformed and was born within the Lower Origin White Qi, styled the "Primordial Venerable," with the cognomen Opening Supreme Clarity. Within the White Qi, this one spirit transformed into three appellations, abiding within the three qi of the chaotic kalpas for three kalpas, giving birth to the Clear and Subtle Heaven.

After Avalokiteśvara, by the Clear and Subtle Heaven, Opening Supreme Clarity uttered this writ within the White Qi, named the "Writ of Numinous Flight and Transcending Tribulation," with thirty-six direct talisman officials. Upon the Clear and Subtle Heaven, it was to examine the Most High Great Dao Sovereign. The Celestial Emperor of the Clear and Subtle Heaven established the Clear and Subtle Heaven, styled the "Primordial Celestial King," with the cognomen Chaotic Spirit Supreme Essence, which was the cognomen of the Primordial Venerable. Within the Clear and Subtle Heaven, he governed the Upper Palace of Jade Clarity for one kalpa, giving birth to the Yu-Yu Heaven.

chunks.original_text: 清微天化生皇曾天，一名弥梵罗台霄绝飞天，云根之都玉清上文，精开真洞明玉宝，直符三十六人。 禹余天帝王禹余天立，号高圣玉晨太上大道，字巘椿，在禹余天中太玄都二劫，化生大赤天。 禹余天化生太明玉完天，一名郁悦那林昌玉台天，天立上精，化生九晖太晨洞真入无飞景玉符，直符三十六人。 大赤天帝王大赤天始立，号曰三天玉童子，元#3正贤，於大赤天中三劫，化生郁单无量天。 大赤天化生清明何童天，一名高桃冲龙罗天，天立上精，化生观灵元神飞天生仙玉符，〔直符〕吏三十六人#4。 郁单无量天帝王始立，号九天丈人，字开元，於无量天中一炁，上禅善无量寿天。 郁单无量天始立，化生玄胎平育天，一名碧落空歌余黎天，天立上精，化生总晨无极飞仙度世符，直符吏三十六人。 上上禅善无量寿天王始立，号九天真王，字上明，於无量寿天中二炁，化生上监天。 上上禅善无量天化生元明文举天，一名加摩坦娄于翳天，天立上精，化生沓曜抗根飞生度世神仙玉符，直符吏三十六人。 上监天王始立，号九霄太真丈人，字凝，於上监天中三炁，化生兜术天。 上监天化生上明七耀天，一名扶刀盖华浮罗天，天立上精，化生飞元玄景晨平度世神仙玉符，直符吏三十六人。 兜术天王始立，号九霄大真王，字明喘，於兜术天中四炁，化生不骄乐天。 兜术天化生虚无越衡天，一名渭耶渠初默天，天立上精，化生合晖晨命应灵仙玉符，直符吏三十六人。 不骄乐天王立，号万始先生洞浪澜，於不骄乐天中五炁，化生应声天。 不骄乐天化生太极蒙翳天，一名冲容育郁谷沙天，天立上清，化生洞微齐真晖晨玄景玉符，直符吏三十六人。 化应声天王，号景道皇上先生，字越，於化应声天中六炁，化生梵宝天。 化应声天化生赤明和阳天，一号单缘察宝轮法天，天立上精，化生玉盖度仙七龙姻隐符，直符吏三十六人。 梵宝天帝王，号八观高元虚皇紫景君，字导精，於梵宝天中七炁，化生梵摩迦夷天。 梵宝天化生玄明恭华天，一名梵元水行天，天立上精，化生太度世飞仙入元〔玉符〕#5，直符吏三十六人。 梵摩迦夷天帝王，号九皇紫天老，字置戍，於梵摩迦夷天中八炁，化生波梨答和天。 梵摩迦夷天化生耀明宗飘天，一名梵炁小微天，天立上精，化生神仙九保元玉符，直符吏三十六人。 波梨答和天帝王，始生赤精太真混元，於波梨答和天中一元，化生摩苛褥明天。 波梨答和天化生竺落皇笳天，一名梵行天，天立上精，化生神仙飞行洞元玉符，直符吏三十六人。 摩苛褥明天帝君王，号玉清高上虚皇，字开造，於摩苛褥明天中一元，化生阿波罗摩褥和天。 摩苛褥明，化生虚明堂曜天，一名梵天，天立上精，化生神仙度世通命玉符，直符吏三十六人。 阿波罗摩褥和天帝王，号玉清紫虚高上元皇，字基，於阿波罗摩褥和天中一元，化生阿卫亿罗天。 阿波罗摩褥憩天化生观明端靖天，一名太皓天，天立上精，化生神仙度世飞神玉符，直符吏三十六人。 阿卫亿罗天帝王，号玉清上皇玉虚之君，字明兰，於阿卫亿罗天中一元，化生太玄那首天。 阿卫亿罗天化生玄明恭庆天，一名水音玄沙天，天立上精，化生神仙度世飞生玉符，直符吏三十六人。

The Yu-Yu Heaven gave birth to the Huang-Zeng Heaven, also named the Mi-Fan-Luo-Tai-Xiao-Jue-Fei Heaven, the cloud-root capital of the Jade Clarity’s Upper Writ, where the essence opened the True Cavern’s Luminous Jade Treasure, with thirty-six direct talisman officials. The Celestial Emperor of the Yu-Yu Heaven established the Yu-Yu Heaven, styled the "High Sage Jade Dawn Supreme Great Dao," with the cognomen Yan-Chun. Within the Yu-Yu Heaven, at the Great Mystery Capital, he governed for two kalpas, giving birth to the Great Red Heaven.

The Yu-Yu Heaven gave birth to the Tai-Ming-Yu-Wan Heaven, also named the Yu-Yue-Na-Lin-Chang-Yu-Tai Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Nine Radiance Great Dawn Cavern-True Entering-Nothing Flying Scenery Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial Emperor of the Great Red Heaven first established it, styled the "Three Heavens Jade Youth," with the cognomen Yuan-Zheng-Xian. Within the Great Red Heaven, he governed for three kalpas, giving birth to the Yu-Shan-Immeasurable Heaven.

The Great Red Heaven gave birth to the Qing-Ming-He-Tong Heaven, also named the Gao-Tao-Chong-Long-Luo Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Observing Numinous Primordial Spirit Flying Heaven Birth-Immortal Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial Emperor of the Yu-Shan-Immeasurable Heaven first established it, styled the "Nine Heavens Venerable," with the cognomen Kai-Yuan. Within the Immeasurable Heaven, by one qi, he ascended to abdicate to the Uppermost Good Immeasurable Longevity Heaven.

The Yu-Shan-Immeasurable Heaven first established, gave birth to the Xuan-Tai-Ping-Yu Heaven, also named the Bi-Luo-Kong-Ge-Yu-Li Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the General Dawn Non-Ultimate Flying Immortal Salvation-World Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial King of the Uppermost Good Immeasurable Longevity Heaven first established it, styled the "Nine Heavens True King," with the cognomen Shang-Ming. Within the Immeasurable Longevity Heaven, by two qi, he gave birth to the Upper Supervisory Heaven.

The Uppermost Good Immeasurable Heaven gave birth to the Yuan-Ming-Wen-Ju Heaven, also named the Jia-Mo-Tan-Lou-Yu-Yi Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Convergent Radiance Resisting-Root Flying Birth Salvation-World Divine Immortal Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial King of the Upper Supervisory Heaven first established it, styled the "Nine Empyrean Supreme True Venerable," with the cognomen Ning. Within the Upper Supervisory Heaven, by three qi, he gave birth to the Dou-Shu Heaven.

The Upper Supervisory Heaven gave birth to the Shang-Ming-Qi-Yao Heaven, also named the Fu-Dao-Gai-Hua-Fu-Luo Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Flying Primordial Mysterious Scenery Dawn Level Salvation-World Divine Immortal Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial King of the Dou-Shu Heaven first established it, styled the "Nine Empyrean Great True King," with the cognomen Ming-Chuan. Within the Dou-Shu Heaven, by four qi, he gave birth to the No-Pride Joy Heaven.

The Dou-Shu Heaven gave birth to the Xu-Wu-Yue-Heng Heaven, also named the Wei-Ye-Qu-Chu-Mo Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Conjoined Radiance Dawn Life Responding Numinous Immortal Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial King of the No-Pride Joy Heaven established it, styled the "Myriad Beginnings Master Cavern-Rippling Waves," governing within the No-Pride Joy Heaven by five qi, giving birth to the Responsive Sound Heaven.

The No-Pride Joy Heaven gave birth to the Tai-Ji-Meng-Yi Heaven, also named the Chong-Rong-Yu-Yu-Gu-Sha Heaven. Upon its establishment, the Upper Clarity gave birth to the Cavern-Subtle Equal-True Radiance Dawn Mysterious Scenery Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial King of the Responsive Sound Heaven, styled the "Scenery Dao August Uppermost Master," with the cognomen Yue, governed within the Responsive Sound Heaven by six qi, giving birth to the Brahma Treasure Heaven.

The Responsive Sound Heaven gave birth to the Chi-Ming-He-Yang Heaven, also named the Shan-Yuan-Cha-Bao-Lun-Fa Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Jade Canopy Salvation-Immortal Seven Dragons Marriage-Concealment Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial Emperor of the Brahma Treasure Heaven, styled the "Eight Observations High Primordial Purple Scenery Lord," with the cognomen Dao-Jing, governed within the Brahma Treasure Heaven by seven qi, giving birth to the Brahma-Makaya Heaven.

The Brahma Treasure Heaven gave birth to the Xuan-Ming-Gong-Hua Heaven, also named the Fan-Yuan-Water-Path Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Great Salvation-World Flying Immortal Entering-Primordial Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial Emperor of the Brahma-Makaya Heaven, styled the "Nine Augusts Purple Heaven Elder," with the cognomen Zhi-Shu, governed within the Brahma-Makaya Heaven by eight qi, giving birth to the Pari-Da-He Heaven.

The Brahma-Makaya Heaven gave birth to the Yao-Ming-Zong-Piao Heaven, also named the Fan-Qi-Small-Micro Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Divine Immortal Nine Preservations Primordial Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial Emperor of the Pari-Da-He Heaven first gave birth to the Red Essence Supreme True Chaotic Primordial. Within the Pari-Da-He Heaven, by one kalpa, he gave birth to the Mo-Ke-Ru-Ming Heaven.

The Pari-Da-He Heaven gave birth to the Zhu-Luo-Huang-Jia Heaven, also named the Brahma-Conduct Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Divine Immortal Flying Conduct Cavern-Primordial Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial Lord and King of the Mo-Ke-Ru-Ming Heaven, styled the "Jade Clarity High Supreme Primordial Sovereign," with the cognomen Kai-Zao, governed within the Mo-Ke-Ru-Ming Heaven by one kalpa, giving birth to the A-Po-Luo-Mo-Ru-He Heaven.

The Mo-Ke-Ru-Ming Heaven gave birth to the Xu-Ming-Tang-Yao Heaven, also named the Brahma Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Divine Immortal Salvation-World Life-Connecting Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial King of the A-Po-Luo-Mo-Ru-He Heaven, styled the "Jade Clarity Purple Void High Supreme Primordial August," with the cognomen Ji, governed within the A-Po-Luo-Mo-Ru-He Heaven by one kalpa, giving birth to the A-Wei-Yi-Luo Heaven.

The A-Po-Luo-Mo-Ru-Qi Heaven gave birth to the Guan-Ming-Duan-Jing Heaven, also named the Great Radiance Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Divine Immortal Salvation-World Flying Spirit Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

The Celestial King of the A-Wei-Yi-Luo Heaven, styled the "Jade Clarity Upper August Jade Void Lord," with the cognomen Ming-Lan, governed within the A-Wei-Yi-Luo Heaven by one kalpa, giving birth to the Tai-Xuan-Na-Shou Heaven.

The A-Wei-Yi-Luo Heaven gave birth to the Xuan-Ming-Gong-Qing Heaven, also named the Water-Sound Mysterious Sand Heaven. Upon its establishment, the celestial essence gave birth to the Divine Immortal Salvation-World Flying Birth Jade Talisman, with thirty-six direct talisman officials.

chunks.original_text: 玉清上宫科太真文竟 #1『又』字疑当作『分』。 #2『天天』，疑当作『天立』。 #3『元』字疑当作『字』。 #4『直符』二字原缺，据上下文补。 #5『玉符』二字原缺，据上下文补。

The Concluding Section of the Jade Clarity Upper Palace Regulations on the Great Perfection Scriptures

[Note 3: The character "元" is suspected to be a miswriting of "字".]
[Note 4: The two characters "直符" were originally missing and have been supplemented based on the context.]
[Note 5: The two characters "玉符" were originally missing and have been supplemented based on the context.]
